summary: The module defines preprocessing transforms used in the automatic 3D segmentation application, chiefly a transform that checks that segmentation label volumes share the same spatial dimensions as their corresponding source images and, when the size difference is within a configurable tolerance, automatically resamples the labels to the source size using nearestâ€‘neighbor interpolation.
business_intent: To guarantee spatial consistency between images and labels during data preparation for medical image segmentation models, reducing errors and simplifying the training pipeline.
